content: lion brand pattern # cwec-watchcap corrections applied june 24 2004 skill level beginner + level 2 size small large finished cap measures 12½ 13 inches long and 21½ 22½ inches around wool-ease® chunky article #630 2 balls *bluebell* crochet hook - size k-10 5 6 5 mm crochet hook - size i-9 special stitches decrease fpdc bpdc top is worked flat from the bottom up gather top stitches and finish seam to complete the top ribbing is worked in rounds after upper hat is completed knit version watch cap knit 1 *lion brand patterns are written in u s crochet terminology * 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/watch-cap-knit
